Item.Text: Contemplation: 3 points per complete Panorama, 1 point per Cherry Tree
Nostalgia: 2 points per Legendary Object, 1 point per Souvenir
Patience: 6 points if last to arrive, 4 points if second-last, 2 points in all other cases
Perfection: 2 points per Accomlishment, 1 point per Calligraphy card
Devotion: Give the Temple the coins spent on acquiring any kind of purchasable card
Fortune: Roll the fortune die, before moving, as if in a Gaming Room
Friendship: Stop on a single space that is occupied by another Traveler as if it was a double space
Health: Select both options for the space you land on (in the order of your choice)
Hospitality: Take your Meal card for free when stopping at an Inn
Vitality: Play again while in the lead position
